levels.name: Frozen Peaks
levels.description: Navigate through treacherous mountain passes with narrow ice platforms and strong winds.

levels.name: Glacial Caves
levels.description: Explore mysterious ice caves with hidden passages and crystal formations.

levels.name: Arctic Storm
levels.description: Battle through a fierce snowstorm with limited visibility and dangerous conditions.

levels.name: Iceberg Islands
levels.description: Jump between floating icebergs in the open ocean.

levels.name: Crystal Palace
levels.description: Navigate through an ancient ice palace with complex architecture.
